#summary A guide to install and configurate development environment on Mac.
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

Configuration of the standard Tonatiuh development environment in a Mac workstation. It is supposed that administrator permissions are available in order to configure the whole environment. 


= Details=

Install and configurate development enviroment
The following links will guide the developer through all the process: 
  
  * Install the third-party libraries needed by the program.
    * [InstallingQtForMac Installing Qt]
    * [InstallingSimageForMac  Installing Simage]
    * [InstallingCoin3DForMac  Installing Coin3D]
    * [InstallingSoQtForMac  Installing SoQt]
    * [InstallingMarbleForMac Installing Marble] 
    * [InstallingBerkeleyDBForMac Installing Berkeley DB]

  * Install and configure the Integrated Development Environment. 
    * [InstallingAndConfiguringEclipseForMac Installing and Configuring Eclipse]
    * [Installing_Subversive Installing Subversive]
    * [BuildingTonatiuhOnMac Building Tonatiuh and plugins]

  * Install Doxygen and configure it. 
    * [InstallingDoxygenForMac Installing Doxygen]
  
  * Install the Unit Testing and Continuous Integration infrastructure.
    * [InstallingGoolgeTestForMac Install GoogleTest]
